examples.example: 我享受在悠闲的午后品尝美味的甜品。

translate.english: I enjoy tasting delicious desserts in the leisurely afternoon.

examples.example: 每次品尝到美味的甜品，我的心情都会变得格外愉悦。

translate.english: Every time I taste delicious dessert, my mood will become extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 我喜欢在完成工作后，去甜品店享受那一份甜蜜的甜品。

translate.english: I like to go to the dessert shop to enjoy the sweet dessert after completing the work.
